title: Shaco bugs
body:
Just wanted to report a bug I've found in 6.22 with {{champion:35}}'s clone.  Occasionally the clone will not attack structures and will prioritise minions before hitting inhib/turret - when this happens the clone doesn't respond to any commands to attack the structure, nor will it change to attack a champion or different minions - it basically goes on auto pilot and sticks to the wave 'til it's cleared, then it will wander over and after a short delay, join you in hitting the structure.  This loss of control has happened at least twice right after a q-r combo where the clone appears while you are still in the invisibility part of your q. Usually when pressing R alone the clone does what it should.

Bugs aside, enjoying the patch!

Cheers

replies.body:
The best place to post stuff like this is here: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report

Just check the guidelines on the sidebar and to see if anyone else has posted it before you do.
